title: Jacket
description: pounded indigo; neck opening trimmed in multicolored woven band ending PL with applique insert; same insert on back of collar; top of sleeve and shoulders heavily embroidered in padded and flat geometric patterns; some of shoulder tapes bordered in red in heavy metal; red predominate color; tape on PR neck edge; front panels longer than back
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
